title: Our Service Workflow
subtitle: From first call to ongoing results, here’s how we deliver value on every project.

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: We review your project needs, budget, and timeline so you know exactly what’s included before we start.

steps.title: Custom Proposal
steps.description: You get a tailored plan of action — transparent pricing, clear milestones, and no surprise add-ons.

steps.title: Project Execution
steps.description: We roll up our sleeves and deliver with efficiency, whether it’s a new build, optimization, or campaign setup.

steps.title: Reporting & Support
steps.description: Regular updates, performance tracking, and ongoing support ensure your investment keeps paying off.
